Graphics I/O functions imformats >>

copygraphics

Copy plot to clipboard.

Syntax

copygraphics(fig)

Input argument

fig

figure object.

Description

copygraphics copy figure to clipboard.

Example

x = -2:0.25:2;
y = x;
[X,Y] = meshgrid(x);
F = X.*exp(-X.^2-Y.^2);
surf(X,Y,F);
copygraphics(gcf());

See also

gcf, saveas.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
